animeDescription: Tekkaman is just an average bright boy in his everyday life. However, modern science can turn him into a mighty space warrior. This becomes a reality when aggressive aliens come from space to invade our planet. Armed with a space lance, Tekkaman gallantly goes into action against the grotesque space creatures. During his battles he encounters a mysterious young man from another planet who helps him out whenever he is in danger.  (Source: Absoluteanime)
animeVoices: ['Mori, Katsuji', 'Ueda, Miyuki', 'Komiya, Kazue', 'Yamada, Yasuo', 'Nakae, Shinji', 'Kuwabara, Takeshi', 'Takiguchi, Junpei']
